- 자기회귀과정: 예측값이 이전 값에만 선형적으로 의존한다고 가정

::: {#c523bb8d .cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns

plt.rcParams['font.family'] = 'Noto Sans KR'

df = pd.read_csv('_data/foot.csv')
```
:::


::: {#fbf9c67a .cell execution_count=2}
``` {.python .cell-code}
from statsmodels.tsa.stattools import adfuller

ADF_result = adfuller(df['foot_traffic'])
ADF_result[0], ADF_result[1]
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=8}
```
(-1.1758885999240625, 0.6838808917896241)
```
:::
:::


- 비 정상성 발견. 차분 진행

::: {#042862ba .cell execution_count=3}
``` {.python .cell-code}
foot_diff = np.diff(df['foot_traffic'], n=1)

ADF_result = adfuller(foot_diff)
ADF_result[0], ADF_result[1]
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=9}
```
(-5.268231347422049, 6.369317654781143e-06)
```
:::
:::


::: {#a546ebcf .cell execution_count=4}
``` {.python .cell-code}
from statsmodels.graphics.tsaplots import plot_acf

plot_acf(foot_diff, lags=20)
plt.show()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display}

::: {#0052474d .cell execution_count=5}
``` {.python .cell-code}
from statsmodels.tsa.arima_process import ArmaProcess

ma2 = np.array([1, 0, 0])
ar2 = np.array([1, -0.33, -0.50])
AR2_process = ArmaProcess(ar2, ma2).generate_sample(nsample=1000)
```
:::


::: {#238b5927 .cell execution_count=6}
``` {.python .cell-code}
from statsmodels.graphics.tsaplots import plot_pacf

plot_pacf(AR2_process, lags=20)
plt.show()
```
